screen_desc: The screenshot shows a mobile version of Booking.com's website. It displays a search for Buenos Aires for the dates of 11th to 12th October for 2 adults. There is a promotional message offering 10% off and information about the Genius Level 1 discounts.
action_think: The user requested to open a new Chrome private tab. The current screen is displaying the Booking.com website. To proceed, I need to open a new tab first and then switch it to private viewing.
action_plan: Press the New Tab icon to open a new tab.
Click on the Private button to switch to private browsing mode.
action_result: Opening a new Chrome private tab is necessary to ensure privacy and security while browsing the internet.
